channel.title: Error with a script

item.title: Error with a script
item.dc:creator: @pk_blooder pk_blooder
item.description:
@pk_blooder wrote:

well i was adding mage lvls and runes to my magic but then while compiling i had this error, didnt even change something at this…

'catch' without 'try catch { ^

[code] //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
if ((EnemyHP2 - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP2;
}

				mageXP = (hitDiff * 4); 
                                    addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff = hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].updateRequired = true;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitUpdateRequired = true;

					}
					catch(Exception e) {
                                                    System.out.println("Error at magic on npcs!");
						println_debug(e.toString());
					}
				
				} 
                              }

else {
sendMessage(“You can’t attack a player’s summoned npc!”);
}
break;

[/code]

FIXED

Read full topic
